au.com.addstar.monolith.attributes

Interface ItemAttributes

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MonoItemAttributes

    public interface ItemAttributes
    Represents attribute modifiers stored on an item

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addModifier(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute, ItemAttributeModifier modifier)
      Adds a modifier to this item
      void clearModifiers()
      Clears all modifiers from the item
      void clearModifiers(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute)
      Clears all modifiers that modify the given attribute
      ItemAttributeModifier getModifier(UUID id)
      Gets a modifier by its UUID
      Collection<ItemAttributeModifier> getModifiers(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute)
      Gets all modifiers that modify the given attribute
      Collection<ItemAttributeModifier> getModifiers(String name)
      Gets all modifiers that have the given name
      void removeModifier(ItemAttributeModifier modifier)
      Removes a modifier from this item

    • Method Detail

      • getModifiers

        Collection<ItemAttributeModifier> getModifiers(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute)
        Gets all modifiers that modify the given attribute
        Parameters:
        attribute - The modified attribute
        Returns:
        A collection of ItemAttributeModifier objects

      • addModifier

        void addModifier(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute,
                 ItemAttributeModifier modifier)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a modifier to this item
        Parameters:
        attribute - The attribute to modify
        modifier - The modifier to add. The UUID of this modifier MUST be unique
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the uuid is not unique

      • removeModifier

        void removeModifier(ItemAttributeModifier modifier)
        Removes a modifier from this item
        Parameters:
        modifier - The modifier to remove

      • clearModifiers

        void clearModifiers(org.bukkit.attribute.Attribute attribute)
        Clears all modifiers that modify the given attribute
        Parameters:
        attribute - The attribute to clear modifiers for

      • clearModifiers

        void clearModifiers()
        Clears all modifiers from the item

      • getModifier

        ItemAttributeModifier getModifier(UUID id)
        Gets a modifier by its UUID
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the modifier
        Returns:
        The modifier or null

      • getModifiers

        Collection<ItemAttributeModifier> getModifiers(String name)
        Gets all modifiers that have the given name
        Parameters:
        name - The name, case sensitive
        Returns:
        A collection of ItemAttributeModifier instances
